column1: IMPORTANT: Please leave this list in the cart when you’re done :-) If found, please mail to Grocerylists.org, P.O. Box 752, St. Louis, MO 63188 USA. Grocerylists.org is the world’s largest online collection of found grocery lists. Visit our blog, our hilarious Top 10 lists, check out our book of found shopping lists, or just waste time browsing the thousands of discarded lists in the collection: grocerylists.org.
*Yes, I know tomatoes technically are classified as fruits, not vegetables. Also, this list is comprehensive but not complete.
I squeezed everything I could into one page. Friendly suggestions for improvements are welcome.
